snippet: In an annual report, the International Monetary Fund said that governments must remain vigilant in structural and banking changes to avoid a financial crisis.
lead_paragraph: In an annual report, the International Monetary Fund said that governments must remain vigilant in structural and banking changes to avoid a financial crisis.

headline.seo: I.M.F. Warns of Risk as Company Debt Grows
